# MPRepeatType.all

**Case**

The current container or playlist is repeated indefinitely.

## Declaration

```swift
case all
```

## Repeat types

- **MPRepeatType.off**: Nothing is repeated during playback.
- **MPRepeatType.one**: A single item is repeated indefinitely.

items.description: A single item is repeated indefinitely.
items.name: MPRepeatType.one
